Seems like the Mercadona supermarket has closed down..although there were still signs up for its carpark.

name: Mas Casablanca
title: (08552) Mas Casablanca
description: Name: MAS CASABLANCA, Type: Furgoperfecto, Free: No -, Drinking water: Yes, WC: Yes, 41°52'50.2"N 2°17'13.9"E 41.880618, 2.287201 Description of the area: The area for vans and caravans, is the parking that is part of the farm facilities there. The farm has been open for years for visits. There is a picnic area with tables and benches. The site is beautiful and at the same time quiet, it is very close to the Montseny routes and very well connected with the rest of the region. Just 6 km from Vic. It is easily accessible with any vehicle. You can spend the night. In order to spend the night, it is mandatory to do one of the types of visits they make to the farm, free or guided. A visit to the farm is highly recommended. Before you go, call to see if it's open and they have a seat.

We can also transfer you to Barcelona or Girona airport in 45min. Displacement apart) . We have a plastic cover for your van. It has the possibility of electricity and water tank with extra cost. We also have an Airb&b for accommodation at home: "a little piece of heaven" Tona-Catalonia (Barcelona) We are waiting for you and your adventures!

title_short: (08519) Bosc La Riba parking and activities
description: We are Bosc la Riba, by Mas La Riba, a family business based on cattle breeding and the forestry sector. We open the doors of our farm to you to offer you leisure and sports activities in nature, within our property. Visits to the farm and its surroundings. We allow overnight stays in our Visitors Parking. Starting point of the Tavertet GR2 hike. Distance from the Sau dam 900 m in the area of Pineda Xica and 1,400 m in the esplai pantà area of Sau i Club Nautico Vic-Sau. We have 8 electrical connection points, a water source and a dry toilet. Water loading and unloading services in the city area (7 km). Good access and flat. Privileged location! With CCTV.

The motorhome area is fantastic, loading and unloading (grey water and toilets), electricity and WiFi, separate collection and can be paid remotely via QR-code. There is a forest in front, where in the morning the children from the neighboring school come to play accompanied by their teachers. In the center, a few hundred meters away, between hills and alleys, is the central square with its bars, restaurants and typical shops of the region.

If you find the chain barrier down, you must call the person in charge of the town hall to open the access to the area (Number on the nameplate), if it is open, do not worry that the person in charge will pass by there a few times per day to check vehicles (at least on weekends) They accept cash and cards. Municipal swimming pool (the price is not included in the overnight stay, to be paid separately), soccer field, playground and toilets.

title: (17401) El Colls -
description: Place in the middle of nature next to the road. Very calm. It is located at an intersection of dirt roads but you can park without getting in the way. There are hardly any vehicles. It is one of the few places in the area where there is some mobile coverage. Access can be tricky but it's worth it. The dirt track is narrow for most of the way. With L2H2 there is no problem. But I do not recommend larger vehicles such as motorhomes. The inconvenience is if you find a vehicle in front of you. If you go two, I recommend that one go to the destination to prevent another vehicle from getting on.

name: Masia Can Cervera
title: (08469) Masia Can Cervera
description:
Mountain campsite in the heart of Montseny. Camping in a natural setting with large lawns or wooded areas. With pool and barbecue area.

DIRECTIONS:
Ignore GPS navigators. It guides you on the shortest route, but not on the route in the best condition. The GPS directs you to kilometer point 14 (Bv-5301) and takes you right through the town of Montseny on a bad road. This is impossible with a caravan and much more difficult with a vehicle. You will find the detour to the campsite directly at kilometer point 15 (Bv-5301) on the right-hand side. From here you have to follow a 2 km path (almost entirely paved) until you reach the campsite.

title: (08588) Sora - 13P Carrer Major

With access to the river and a picnic area with barbecues. Very shady areas. We will repeat for sure. It is not the cheapest but it is worth it.

name: Camping Vidrà
title: (17515) Camping Vidrà
description: Excellent family campsite for a weekend. Everything is very clean. Large pitches, we have a motorhome over 7 meters and all is well. The restaurant's food is homemade. Good price. Weekend 32 euros. They accept animals. The owner's name is Bea, very kind and sympathetic. Ideal for excursions around to enjoy the view.
